en: The crew prepared for the voyage across the Pacific Ocean.

en: A coat is an article of clothing.

en: Hang your coat and hat up on the rack over there.
zh: 把你的外套和帽子挂在那边的架子上。

en: You have done a very good job.
zh: 你做得非常好。

en: You've done a very good job.
zh: 你做得非常好。

en: A good lawyer will always zero in on a key piece of evidence.
zh: 一个好的律师总是会盯住关键的证据。

en: A good sailor only requires a short time to get his sea legs.
zh: 一个好的水手只需要很短的时间就能适应海上生活。

en: Excellent putt.

en: Do you think it will work?

en: A good diplomat is a person who practices the technique of letting someone else let the cat out of the bag.
zh: 一个好的外交家是那种运用让别人泄露秘密技巧的人。

en: It's made of fine cotton.
zh: 它是用优质棉制成的。

en: Quality goods are worth it in the long run.
zh: 从长远来看，优质商品是值得的。

en: Don't risk insulting your boss.

zh: 在公共场合取笑你的老板是不礼貌的。

en: My supervisor looked at the revised schedule and nodded his agreement.
zh: 我的主管看了修改后的日程安排，点头表示同意。

en: The boss allotted tasks to his men.
zh: 老板给他的手下分配了任务。

zh: 我的老板口述了一封信，让他的秘书打字。

en: My boss turned down his proposal.

en: My boss rejected the budget for the new project.
zh: 我的老板拒绝了新项目的预算。

en: The boss asked Mr Brown to take charge of the office while she was away.

en: The boss'll have my head.

en: Between them, the two largest companies account for a share of more than 50% of the market.

en: Where's the up-escalator?

en: The Queen lives in Buckingham Palace.

zh: 有些人天生就有解决困难的能力，而另一些人则天生就是麻烦制造者。

zh: 我们历经千辛万苦找到他，结果他却让人非常失望。

en: The prize went to him.

en: I hope you will succeed in winning the prize.

en: The elephant was killed by the hunter.
zh: 这头大象是被猎人杀死的。

en: The elephant is the largest land animal.

en: An elephant has a long nose.

en: Elephants have long trunks.

en: An elephant is a very large animal.

en: Elephants are in danger of dying out.

en: An elephant is an enormous animal.

en: The elephant is bigger than all the other animals.

en: The elephants are the chief attraction at the circus.

en: Elephants live in Asia and Africa.

en: This book says that elephants live to be over 100 years old.

en: The size of the elephant astonished the little boy.

en: An elephant is a strong animal.

en: Have you ever seen an elephant fly?

en: More detailed information will be supplied on application to the publisher.
zh: 更详细的信息将在向出版商申请时提供。

en: For particulars, apply to the college.

en: Apply to the office for further details.
zh: 如需更多详情，请到办公室咨询。

en: I didn't go into details.

en: For further details, call Gisèle.

en: The investigation revealed him to be a spy.
zh: 调查显示他是一名间谍。

en: There isn't time to explain in detail.

en: Let me know the details.

en: A thorough investigation is now in progress.

en: I move that the witness be summoned on Monday.

en: Loan on deeds needed the joint surety.

en: In the absence of definite evidence, he was acquitted.
zh: 在缺乏确凿证据的情况下，他被判无罪。

en: In the absence of firm evidence the prisoner was set free.
zh: 在缺乏确凿证据的情况下，囚犯被释放了。

en: When he was faced with the evidence, he had to admit that he was guilty.
zh: 当他面对证据时，他不得不承认自己有罪。

en: There is not even a semblance of proof.

zh: 证据就摆在我们面前。考虑到这一点，再加上他没有不在场证明，毫无疑问他就是罪魁祸首。

en: In preparation for painting a portrait, my friend takes many photographs in order to study the subject closely.
zh: 为了准备画肖像，我的朋友会拍很多照片，以便仔细研究对象。

en: Did anybody recommend us to you?

zh: 向你推荐我们的人叫什么名字？

en: Let me introduce myself.

en: Please let me introduce myself.

en: Thank you for your referral.

en: I'm used to being laughed at.

en: Don't make me laugh!

en: You amuse me.

en: I cannot help laughing.

en: It's no laughing matter.

en: Stay calm, and do your best.

en: Stay calm and do your best.
zh: 保持冷静，尽你所能。

en: Small children often like books about dragons and other monsters.
zh: 小孩子通常喜欢关于龙和其他怪物的书。

en: Books about things like dinosaurs and monsters are a favorite among young children.
zh: 关于恐龙和怪物之类的书深受小孩子的喜爱。

en: Even a little child knows its name.
zh: 即使是小孩子也知道自己的名字。

en: Small children can be very destructive.
zh: 小孩子可能会很有破坏力。

en: The little cabin was bathed in moonlight.
zh: 小木屋沐浴在月光下。

en: The owner of the small dog gripped its neck and scolded it.
zh: 小狗的主人抓住它的脖子，训斥了它。

en: A small bridge arched the stream.
zh: 一座小桥横跨小溪。

en: The small companies were absorbed into a big organization.
zh: 小公司被并入了一个大组织。

en: The small company was taken over by a large organization.
zh: 这家小公司被一家大型组织收购了。

en: Tiny blossoms have come out all over the river bank.
zh: 河岸上到处都开满了细小的花朵。

en: Draw a small circle.
zh: 画一个小圆圈。

en: In spite of their tiny restaurant they managed to pull through the recession.
zh: 尽管他们的餐厅很小，他们还是设法度过了经济衰退。

en: Don't trouble about small things.
zh: 不要为小事烦恼。

en: This is fairly good except for minor mistakes.
zh: 除了小错误，这相当不错。

en: It's too small.
zh: 太小了。

en: The tiny birthmark took nothing from her loveliness.
zh: 小小的胎记丝毫没有减损她的美丽。

en: I can't read small letters.
zh: 我看不清小字。

en: Be kind to little animals.
zh: 善待小动物。

en: A small town lies between the big cities.
zh: 大城市之间坐落着一个小镇。

en: The small boys rang the door bell and ran away.
zh: 小男孩们按了门铃就跑开了。

en: A small car is more economical than a large one.
zh: 小型汽车比大型汽车更经济。

en: A small car takes little room.
zh: 小型汽车占用的空间很小。

en: Small children tend to wander off if you don't watch them all the time.
zh: 如果你不一直看着他们，小孩子往往会走丢。

en: Young children soon pick up words they hear.
zh: 小孩子很快就能学会他们听到的词语。

en: Small print looks dim.
zh: 小字看起来很模糊。

en: I noticed that a small gray animal was looking toward us.
zh: 我注意到一只灰色的小动物正朝我们这边看。

en: Three pieces, including a small one.
zh: 三件，包括一件小的。

en: I'm looking for a small suitcase.
zh: 我在找一个小手提箱。

en: He makes a mountain out of a molehill.
zh: 他小题大做。

en: She watched the grass turn green.
zh: 她看着草地变绿。

en: At night, she used to dream of the country and the field of daisies and the apple trees dancing in the moonlight.
zh: 晚上，她常常梦见乡村，梦见雏菊花田和在月光下跳舞的苹果树。

en: The small house had come to look shabby, though it was just as good as ever underneath.
zh: 这栋小房子看起来已经破旧了，尽管它的质量还和以前一样好。

en: She couldn't be sold for gold or silver, so she just stayed there and watched.
zh: 她不能被卖成金银，所以她只是待在那里看着。

en: There was something about that house that made her stop and look again.
zh: 那栋房子总有某种东西让她停下来再次观看。

en: There will be a big earthquake in the future.
zh: 将来会发生大地震。

en: People tomorrow will have different ideas.
zh: 明天的人们会有不同的想法。

en: The truth will come out in the future.
zh: 真相将来会水落石出。

en: What would you like to be in the future?
zh: 将来你想做什么？

en: What do you want to be in the future?
zh: 你将来想做什么？

en: It is impossible to know what will happen in the future.
zh: 不可能知道将来会发生什么。

en: Who can tell what will happen in the future?
zh: 谁能知道将来会发生什么？

en: There is no telling what will happen in the future.
zh: 无法预料将来会发生什么。

en: Who can predict what will happen in the future?
zh: 谁能预测将来会发生什么？

en: We can't tell what may happen in the future.
zh: 我们无法知道将来会发生什么。

en: No one knows what'll happen in the future.
zh: 没人知道将来会发生什么。

en: What will happen in the future no one can tell.
zh: 将来会发生什么，没人能说得准。

en: It is not mine to foretell the future.
zh: 我无权预言未来。

en: In the future, we won't be handicapped by old age.
zh: 将来，我们不会再受衰老所困扰。

en: Please take more care in the future.
zh: 将来请多加小心。

en: I'd like to get into journalism in the future.
zh: 将来我想从事新闻业。

en: You mustn't spare your efforts so that you can realize your dream in the future.
zh: 你必须不遗余力，以便将来实现你的梦想。

en: I can't help thinking of the future.
zh: 我忍不住去想未来。

en: I can't help thinking about the future.
zh: 我忍不住去想未来。

en: I am full of anxiety about the future.
zh: 我对未来充满焦虑。

en: You'd better study for the sake of your future.
zh: 你最好为了你的未来而学习。

en: How to meet future energy demand is a big question we must consider.
zh: 如何满足未来的能源需求是我们必须考虑的一个大问题。

en: I feel uneasy about my future.
zh: 我对我的未来感到不安。

en: Put by money for the future.
zh: 为将来存钱。

en: We must provide for future.
zh: 我们必须为未来做准备。

en: Do you feel secure about the future?
zh: 你对未来感到安心吗？

en: You should think about your future.
zh: 你应该考虑你的未来。

en: You never can tell what will happen in the future.
zh: 你永远无法预料未来会发生什么。

en: I expect a subway station will be here in the future.
zh: 我预计未来这里会有一个地铁站。

en: What would he like to be in the future?
zh: 他将来想做什么？

en: What are you going to be in the future?
zh: 你将来想做什么？

en: In the future we may need to take another look at the way decisions such as this are actually implemented.
zh: 未来我们可能需要重新审视此类决策的实际执行方式。

en: When, one day, computers undertake to translate literary works, it will be the end of literature as we know it.
zh: 当有一天，计算机开始翻译文学作品时，我们所知的文学就将终结。

en: The officer inspired his men to be brave.
zh: 那位军官激励他的部下勇敢作战。

en: Officers will henceforth wear ties at dinner.
zh: 军官们今后在晚餐时要打领带。

en: The general cut a distinguished figure in his dress uniform.
zh: 那位将军身着礼服，显得风度翩翩。

en: The general said to the brave man, "You deserve a medal."
zh: 将军对那位勇敢的人说：“你值得一枚奖章。”

en: The general concentrated the soldiers in Paris.
zh: 将军把士兵集中在巴黎。

en: The general ordered the massacre of all war prisoners.
zh: 将军下令屠杀所有战俘。

en: The general participated in the plot with his men.
zh: 将军和他的部下一起参与了阴谋。

en: The general commanded them to move on.
zh: 将军命令他们继续前进。

en: The general commanded him to report to headquarters.
zh: 将军命令他向总部报告。

en: The general took the bull by the horns and saved his army from disaster.
zh: 将军当机立断，使他的军队免于灾难。

en: The general shook hands with us.
zh: 将军和我们握手。

en: The general commanded that the city be attacked.
zh: 将军命令进攻这座城市。

en: The general had 20/20 hindsight about the defeat, but no foresight at all.
zh: 将军对失败有百分之百的事后诸葛亮，但根本没有先见之明。

en: The general never lost his presence of mind in the face of the large force of the enemy.
zh: 面对强大的敌人，将军从未失去镇定。

en: The general's massive presence awes everyone.
zh: 将军强大的气场让每个人都感到敬畏。

en: He who would the daughter win, with the mother must begin.
zh: 想要赢得女儿的芳心，必须先从母亲入手。

en: I am going to apply for a scholarship.
zh: 我打算申请奖学金。

en: The scholarship enabled her to study abroad.
zh: 这笔奖学金使她能够出国留学。

en: The scholarship enable her to go to college.
zh: 这笔奖学金使她能够上大学。

en: The scholarship enabled her to go to university.
zh: 这笔奖学金使她能够上大学。

en: I got a grant for my tuition.
zh: 我获得了一笔学费补助金。

en: The scholarship made it possible for him to continue his education.
zh: 这笔奖学金使他能够继续他的教育。

en: The Commerce Department reports retail sales rose seven-tenths of 1 percent last month mainly thanks to strong auto sales.
zh: 商务部报告称，上个月零售额增长了0.7%，这主要归功于强劲的汽车销售。

en: Commercial Code can be called an enterprise method.
zh: 商法典可以被称为企业方法。

en: It often happens that goods sell all the better for their high price.
zh: 商品往往因其高价而卖得更好。

en: The goods were transported by ship.
zh: 货物是用船运输的。

en: All the goods for sale are set out on the tables.
zh: 所有待售商品都摆放在桌子上。

en: If you wish, you may pick them up, or we would be glad to send them back to you.
zh: 如果您愿意，您可以自己取走，或者我们很乐意把它们寄回给您。

en: Don't touch the goods.
zh: 请勿触摸商品。

en: Please use our toll-free number for calls regarding merchandise.
zh: 有关商品的问题，请使用我们的免费电话号码。

en: I always have to wear a tie because of my job.
zh: 因为我的工作，我总是要打领带。

en: Two of a trade seldom agree.
zh: 同行是冤家。

en: After business came to a halt, many bathhouses added new facilities, such as saunas and exercise equipment, in an effort to attract customers.
zh: 在生意停滞后，许多澡堂增加了新的设施，如桑拿和运动器材，以吸引顾客。

en: Merchants complain about the depression.
zh: 商人们抱怨经济萧条。

en: Business was a little slow last month.
zh: 上个月生意有点清淡。

en: The business is in the red.
zh: 生意亏损了。

en: It's all up with my business.
zh: 我的生意全完了。

en: Business is declining.
zh: 生意正在衰退。

en: Business is quite slow.
zh: 生意很清淡。

en: How's business?
zh: 生意怎么样？

en: Your business is flourishing, I hear.
zh: 听说你的生意很兴隆。
